page.title: 20The Local Weather.
page.content: Our weather is influenced mainly by the hills and warm air being blown off the North Atlantic Drift. Because of this we have a lot of rain. During the winter we have little snow because we are close to the sea. The readings below are: Rain (Grange) average,Temp. (Grange) 1984,Sun (Morecambe) average. {Month Rain(mm) Temp(C) Sun(Hours) -------------------------------------- Jan....116.6.......4.4........47 Feb.....73.8.......4.6........69 Mar.....90.9.......7.34......116 Apr.....73.5......11.2.......166 May.....72.8......14.97......210 Jun.....86.4......17.08......209 Jul.....89.9......20.9.......176 Aug....109.8......21.4.......172 Sep....128.0......15.4.......129 Oct....137.1......12.9........93 Nov....137.8.......8.9........53 Dec....120.8.......7.4........36
